kea.chatsystem.server.util

Class ClientList

  • java.lang.Object
    • kea.chatsystem.server.util.ClientList

  • public class ClientList
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class to hold active clients in a collection

      • getInstance

        public static ClientList getInstance()
        Synchronized singleton get to avoid more than one instance
        Returns:

      • updateHeartbeat

        public boolean updateHeartbeat(java.lang.String username)
        Update the last heartbeat timestamp for a client
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the client
        Returns:
        true if the client exists and the value was updated, false if not

      • addClient

        public boolean addClient(java.lang.String username,
                         java.net.InetAddress ipAddress,
                         int port)
        Synchronized method to add a client to the collection. Synchronized, to prevent two clients added with the same username at the same time
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the client
        ipAddress - The ip address of the client
        port - The port number of the client
        Returns:
        true if the client was successfully added, false if not

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String username)
        Removes a client from the collection
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the client to remove

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive(java.lang.String username)
        Method to determine if a client is active
        Parameters:
        username - Username of a given client
        Returns:
        true if the username exists in collection, false if not

      • getUsernameList

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getUsernameList()
        get method
        Returns:
        a set collection containing the usernames currently in the active client list

      • getClientInfoList

        public java.util.List<ClientInfo> getClientInfoList()
        get method
        Returns:
        a list of ClientInfo objects that are currently in the active client list

      • removeInactiveClients

        public int removeInactiveClients()
        Method to automatically remove clients that are no longe active
        Returns:
        A number representing how many clients were removed
